description.value:
At 1st level, each sentinel chooses a season that demonstrates his or her affinity for that aspect of nature's power. Your choice of season determines some of your class features, including the animal companion you gain.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.5n2bOS9WRg3yUk7c]{Druid of Spring}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.pLnGYm81U3y7VTMb]{Druid of Summer}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-features.KZmvVQYPFoDhjwLg]{Druid of the Wastes}
